name: Jelly Smasher
description:
Jelly Smasher is a Addictive and Frustrating SWIPE to Smash Game!

Just SWIPE the screen and smash all jellies.

There are 3 MODE of GAME:

- Kids Mode (contain kids songs BGM) with no limit to play !

- Campaign

- Time Trial !

Smash the Super Cute Jelly, Collect Powerups but Watchout of Bombs!

(New Ice Power to freeze time and now more challenging with Jelly Boss!)

Have fun !!!
